## IDecoratorResolution.name() method

Sets named resolution flag. Service will be resolved given the name provided

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
name(value: string): WithDecoratorResolverName;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  value | <code>string</code> | the name for the service to be resolved with |

<b>Returns:</b>

`WithDecoratorResolverName`

- an instance of [WithDecoratorResolverName](./typeioc.withdecoratorresolvername.md) interface
